title: The Princess's wedding day
brief_description: Highlights of the wedding day of HRH Princess Elizabeth and Philip Mountbatten. Shows the procession of Elizabeth and George VI to Westminster Abbey, the marriage ceremony, the Royal couple with the King, Queen and Queen Mother waving to cheering crowds from the balcony at Buckingham Palace. Narrated by Anna Neagle.
